name: Attack Win
_source: # put Euclid's items in the convoy
s;Melodie;Ha! The tyrants are dead!{w}{br}I can't believe we actually did it!
s;Melodie;Simon, I didn't think you had it in you.{w}{br}But you managed to step up and put these parasites in their place.
s;Simon;I'm just... not sure we did the right thing here.{w}{br}There must've been other ways to handle this.

s;Melodie;Some people only listen to force, Simon.{w}{br}And as much as these Peloponnesian weirdos try to act all enlightened,{w} they won't reason with anyone born outside their city's walls.{w} This was the only way.
s;Simon;If you say so.{w} I just can't shake the feeling that we've caused more disorder here than needed.
s;Melodie;Simon, you're always going on about "order."{w} But you're an agent of chaos like me.{w} That's why I like you.
s;Melodie;I never saw myself siding with a lord.{w}{br}But you and your allies seem to want to shake the world without shattering it.{w}{br}That's a mentality I can get behind.
s;Simon;I think we have very different conceptions of what our goals are...{w}{br}But I can't help agreeing that this world might need some shaking.
